channel.title: Refresher--(I used Jahuros bitmap of the random,so I didnt make this completely)
channel.description:
[b]Credits[/b]
[u][b]Jahuro[/b][/u]--For his random bitmap-I didn't ask permission,so if you don't want me to use it then tell me. Script_Owned4(me)--For making the rest of the script. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]I have problems,help me![/b]
You should be using SCAR Divi 3.11. You should have downloaded SRL by clicking File-Download SRL. You might have played with the script a little so download it again or fix it if you know how too. If you have any [b]OTHER[/b] problems please post. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]Instructions[/b] 1.Open I6 2.Drag the "crosshairs" to the page. 3.Run the script. 4.Enjoy!!! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Remember...
[size=72pt][b]ENJOY!![/b][/size]
[b]NOTE:Next Version Will Use Progress Report[/b]

item.title: Refresher--(I used Jahuros bitmap of the random,so I didnt make this completely)
item.dc:creator: @Acorna Acorna
item.description:
@Acorna wrote:

I’m getting the error

“Line 88: [Error] (21179:28): Unknown identifier ‘x’ in script F:\Programs\SCAR 3.22\Scripts\Neopets\Refresher.scar”

When I try to run this script, is there anyway to fix this?

Read full topic

item.title: Refresher--(I used Jahuros bitmap of the random,so I didnt make this completely)
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

[quote=“jahuro, post:2, topic:134792”]Nice. I dont mind about the bitmap, you can have it, but, it isn’t very accurate. It will always detect when there is a random, but sometimes it will detect a random when there isnt one there.

Also, with Wait(3000);, you might want to make it a bit more random. Wait(3000 + random (1000));.

Well done :).[/quote]
Hehe,I had to use your bitmap, and I know the wait+random…

I am not a beginner lol…

Read full topic
item.source: Refresher--(I used Jahuros bitmap of the random,so I didnt make this completely)

item.title: Refresher--(I used Jahuros bitmap of the random,so I didnt make this completely)
item.dc:creator: @jahuro jahuro
item.description:
@jahuro wrote:

Nice. I dont mind about the bitmap, you can have it, but, it isn’t very accurate. It will always detect when there is a random, but sometimes it will detect a random when there isnt one there.

Also, with Wait(3000);, you might want to make it a bit more random. Wait(3000 + random (1000));.

Well done :).

Read full topic
item.source: Refresher--(I used Jahuros bitmap of the random,so I didnt make this completely)

item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

Credits

Jahuro–For his random bitmap-I didn’t ask permission,so if you don’t want me to use it then tell me.
Script_Owned4(me)–For making the rest of the script.

I have problems,help me!

You should be using SCAR Divi 3.11.
You should have downloaded SRL by clicking File-Download SRL.
You might have played with the script a little so download it again or fix it if you know how too.
If you have any OTHER problems please post.

Instructions
1.Open I6
2.Drag the “crosshairs” to the page.
3.Run the script.
4.Enjoy!!!

Remember…

[size=72pt]ENJOY!![/size]
